server_join.description:
I was made by **pedrofracassi#4623** to help organize your beautiful Guild.

If you want to know more about me, type `d!help`.

{0} [Add me to your server]({1}) | [Join my server]({2})

osu.title: {0}'s profile
osu.is_spelled_correctly: Please check if you spelled the player's username correctly
osu.weird_error: The osu! API returned null values for this account.
osu.not_our_fault:
This is not my fault, it's ppy's.

[You can still check the profile on the website if you want to.]({0})

playing._description: Shows how many people are playing a certain game at the moment
playing.zero: There is **no one** in this guild playing `{0}` at the moment
playing.one: There is **one person** in this guild playing `{0}` at the moment
playing.more: There are **{1}** people playing `{0}` at the moment
playing.error_no_args: You have to specify the game!

setlang._description: Changes my language in the server
setlang.no_args: You have to specify a language.
setlang.no_permission: You need the **"Manage Guild"** permission in order to change my language.

botinfo.error_ip: There was an error while getting my own IP

lol._description: Shows information about a League of Legends summoner
lol.summoner_error: There was an error while getting this summoner profile.
lol.summoner_error_desc: Please contact my owner (pedrofracassi#4623) so he can fix this.
lol.summoner_region_error: You have to specify a summoner and a region!
lol.no_summoner_error: You have to specify a summoner!

lmgtfy._description: Generates a "Let Me Google That For You" link

roleme._description: Gives you a role from the server.
roleme.id_not_role: `{0}` isn't a valid role ID for this server.
roleme.no_permission: You need the **"Manage Guild**" permission in order to do this
roleme.insuficcient_args_add: You need to specify a role name and role ID!
roleme.insuficcient_args_remove: You need to specify a role name!
roleme.add_usage:
**Usage:** `d!roleme --add <role name> <role id>`
**Example:** `d!roleme --add lol 358446520334286851`

Pro tip: You can get the role IDs from d!roleids
roleme.heres_a_list: Here's a list of avaliable roles:
roleme.role_remove_success: I removed the role {0} from you.
roleme.role_give_fail: I wasn't able to give you the role {0}.
roleme.role_remove_fail: I wasn't able to remove the role {0} from you.
roleme.please_ask_owner: Please ask the server owner to check my permissions.

roleids._description: Shows the IDs of the server's roles

npm._description: Shows information about a npm package
npm.no_args: You need to specify a package name.
npm.package_not_found: I couldn't find a npm package by that name.
npm.package_not_found_desc: Please check if you spelled it correctly.

suggestion._example: d!suggestion Add a command that shows me waifus
suggestion._description: Sends a suggestion to my developer
suggestion.trello_error: An error ocurred while trying to add your suggestion to Trello.
suggestion.trello_error_desc: Please contact my owner or try again later.
suggestion.card_add_success: I've added your suggestion to my Trello board.

autorole._description: Sets a default role for new members (or bots)
autorole.no_permission: You need the **"Manage Guild"** permission in order to change my language.
autorole.db_put_error: There was an error while saving that into the database.
autorole.db_put_success: I saved {0} as the default role for new members.
autorole.db_put_success_bots: I saved {0} as the default role for new bots.
autorole.pro_tip: Pro tip: You can get role IDs from the d!roleids command
autorole.no_args: You need to specify a role ID!
autorole.inexistent_role: `{0}` isn't a valid role ID for this server.
autorole.clear_error:
Something went wrong while clearing the default roles.

`{0}`If you think this is a bug, please report it using `d!bugreport`
